field.name: summary
field.value: Add native support to Nullable Types

field.name: description
field.value:
The handling of nullable types in ActiveRecord is currently very cumbersome to implement.
After some bad time on configuring it, I've documented in the wiki:
http://castleproject.org/index.php/ActiveRecord:Reference_Documentation#Using_Nullable_Types
Now I think we can work in a better approach, maybe integrate the Nullables library in the main ActiveRecord distribuition.
